query: Create a flowchart showing a user authentication process with login, password validation, 2FA, and success/failure paths
expected_behavior: Asks for clarification on diagram tool preference (Mermaid vs Graphviz) if not specified
Creates a clear flowchart with decision points and process flow
Uses proper syntax for the chosen diagramming tool
Includes all specified elements: login, validation, 2FA, success/failure paths
Provides both the diagram source code and rendering instructions
